snippet.title: Alien Rage E3 gameplay footage [PEGI]
snippet.description:
The first E3 attendants will experience the Alien Rage hands-on! See the footage and tell us how do you find our hardcore sci-fi shooter! Alien Rage will be available later this year as digital download on PC, PS3 and X360.
 
Big moment for all of us here - our hardcore sci-fi FPS is presenting to the public at E3, so there's no turning back now. Take a look at the FIRST gameplay footage and tell us how you like it.
